results.title: Statin therapy protects against abdominal aortic aneurysms by inducing the accumulation of regulatory T cells in ApoE-/- mice.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ regulated gut microbial @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@dysbiosis@@@, which might also be associated with Treg generation.
